Bohrium.Discovered: Peter Armbruster and Gottfried Munzenber in 1976

Boron.Discovered By: Sir Humphry Davy and J.L Gay-Lussac in 1808

Copernicium.Discovered By: S. Hofmann, V. Ninov and F.P. Hessbuger in 1996

Dysprosium.Discovered By: Paul Emile Lecoq de Boisbaudran in 1886

Einsteinium.Discovered By: Argonne at the University of California in 1952

Flerovium.Discovered: Dubna (Joint Institute for Nuclear Research) in Russia, jan 1999

Hassium.Discovered: Peter Armbruster and Gottfried Munzenber in 1984

Moscovium.Discovered By: Scientists from the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research in Dubna, Russia, and Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in California in 2003

Nihonium.Discovered: Scientists from the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research in Dubna, Russia, and Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory in California in 2003

Protactinium.Discovered By: K. Kajans and O.H. Gohring in 1913

Rubidium.Discovered By: Robert Wilhem Bunsen and Gustav Robert Kirchhoff in 1861

Samarium.Discovered By: Paul Emile Lecoq de Boisbaudran in 1879

Tungsten.Discovered By: Fausto and Juan Jose de Elhuyar in 1783
